{
 - follow: False
   host: hexlet.io
 - proxy: 123.234.53.22
 - timeout: 50
 + timeout: 20
 + verbose: True
}


{
 - follow: False
 + follow: True
 - host: hexlet.io
 + host: google.com
 - proxy: 123.234.53.22
 + proxy: 192.168.0.1
 - timeout: 50
 + timeout: 10
}


{
 + cover: False
 - follow: False
 - host: hexlet.io
 + name: google.com
 + period: 30
 - proxy: 123.234.53.22
 + server: 0.0.0.0
 - timeout: 50
}
